title: Travelling by bus? We're near the line! 2 br / 2 ba!
posting_body: ['RENTAL INFO', 'Rental Rates:', '$1396 - $1924/month', 'Location:', '5400 Memorial Dr Stone Mountain, GA 30083', 'Unit for Rent:', '2-BR 2-BA |', 'Square Feet:', '1400 sq ft |', 'Lease Length:', 'Variable', 'show contact info', 'PROPERTY AMENITIES', '◾ 24 Hour Availability', '◾ Business Center/Clubhouse', '◾ Convenient Online Rental Payments', '◾ Heart Healthy Fitness Center', '◾ Laundry Facilities', '◾ Package Service', '◾ Planned Social Activities', '◾ Playground', '◾ Resident Referral Program', '◾ Sparkling Swimming Pool', '◾ City of Decatur "Award-Winning" Dining Just Minutes Away', '◾', 'Complimentary Wi-Fi At The Business Center, Pool and Sundeck', '◾ Convenient to DeKalb Medical and Emory Hospitals/Medical Centers', '◾ DeKalb Farmers Market is a Short Drive', '◾ Easy Access to I-285 (Atlanta Perimeter), I-20 & I-85', '◾ Monthly Pest Control', '◾ Northlake Mall and North DeKalb Mall Shopping', '◾ On Marta Bus Line.', 'Kensington and Indian Creek Rail Stations Nearby', '◾ Stone Mountain Park Close', 'By', '◾ Total Electric - Gardens and Townhomes', 'APARTMENT AMENITIES', '◾ Cable TV/High Speed Internet Ready', '◾ Carpeted Floor', '◾ Ceiling Fans', '◾ Central Air Conditioning and Heating', '◾ Dishwasher', '◾ Eat-In Family Kitchens/Pantry', '◾ Range', '◾', 'Tub/Shower', '◾ Vinyl Flooring', '◾ Formal Dining Room', '◾ Frost-Free Refrigerator', '◾ High Speed Internet Access', '◾ Individual Laundry Rooms with Washer/Dryer Connections', '◾ Linen Closets', '◾ Mini Blinds', '◾ Spacious Storage with Walk-In Closets', '◾ Sunrooms and Private Patios in Select Apartments', '◾ Trash Compactor', 'ADDITIONAL INFO', 'Description:', 'Strategically located in Dekalb County, Linden Ridge Apartment Homes in Stone Mountain, GA offers condo-style living in enormous total electric garden apartments and townhomes.', 'With up to 1,925 square feet of living space, all apartments homes here have either a screened-in porch or sunroom, eat-in kitchens, separate living and dining areas, and full-size washer/dryer connections.', 'Take care of business at Linden Ridge!', 'Pet Policy:', 'Pets Welcome!', 'Non-aggressive breeds accepted.', 'Weight Restrictions may apply.', 'Please see the office for fees & other details!', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Linden Ridge:', 'show contact info', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '81A1BF6F87C046B']
